project_descr: Support mechanisms that can ensure more effective feedback between citizens and government as an integral part of every stage of policy cycle.

outputs.output_descr: This project will address the achievement of the following results: (i) Citizens have effective access to information at local level. The project will focus on the roles of different public offices at the municipal level. (ii) Local governments utilize the feedback received from users to improve the quality and transparency of local level public services. The project will introduce the CRC (Citizens Report Card) which is a methodology that is used to inform the policy process at the local level.
